name: Submerged Diver
description:
You are a treasure hunter! There is a chest of great value left by ancient pirates in the depths of the ocean. Will you be able to get it? It is an ultimate challange for an adventurer like you!

At the beginning you have nothing but your mortal self. You need to become stronger… or just to buy proper equipment. There’s the ocean full of dangers in front of you and you have no choice but to give it a try…
